biotools.summary: SDImpute is an implement block imputation for dropout events in scRNA-seq data. SDImpute combines both cell-level and gene-level information to identify the drop-out events and borrows the information unaffected by dropouts from similar cells to impute the dropouts.

bioschemas.name: SDImpute
bioschemas.summary: SDImpute is an implement block imputation for dropout events in scRNA-seq data. SDImpute combines both cell-level and gene-level information to identify the drop-out events and borrows the information unaffected by dropouts from similar cells to impute the dropouts.
